item.title: About
item.description: Hi I’m RaphGL. I’m a hobbyist programmer trying to break into the field. I’ve always had an interest for computers and everything related. Since I was a child I was always glued to my computer trying to tweak it. My first computer had windows 98 on it and I spent hours playing the good ol' games on it. At around 12 years old I tried to learn programming, back then I could only write basic websites and I didn’t get very far, I gave up eventually.
